SELECT zi.*,zs.name categoryName, (SELECT sa.full_name FROM sys_area sa WHERE sa.`code` = zi.area_code ) areaName FROM zs_personal zi left join zs_category zs on zi.category_id =zs.id
AND zi.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND zi.status = #{status}
AND zi.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND zi.short_code like concat('',#{shortCode},'%')
and zi.status != 0
order by zi.create_time desc
